Innovator Spotlight
*Note from the editor*:

Welcome to VentureBeat's Innovator Spotlight, where we bring you news on
the most cutting edge technologies today.

VB digest from this week:

Asato: An AI copilot for CIOs
<https://venturebeat.us17.list-manage.com/track/click?u=f67554569818c29c4c844d121&id=977fb601fa&e=ac54f1564a>
AI meets materials science
<https://venturebeat.us17.list-manage.com/track/click?u=f67554569818c29c4c844d121&id=a6cd73f8da&e=ac54f1564a>
New reinforcement learning tool uses human cues to correct mistakes
<https://venturebeat.us17.list-manage.com/track/click?u=f67554569818c29c4c844d121&id=dc3b269bf1&e=ac54f1564a>

And more — keep scrolling!

Other news we're following:

   - Nvidia improves performance with 5X faster AI: With its rival AMD
   making a big announcement this week on its MI300 flagship GPU for
   generative AI, Nvidia remains confident that its hardware, software and
   integrated systems will keep it in the lead. To prove the point, Nvidia
   announced new benchmarks. Again. (Forbes
   <https://venturebeat.us17.list-manage.com/track/click?u=f67554569818c29c4c844d121&id=9961bb86d0&e=ac54f1564a>
   )
   - Elon Musk's X.AI files with the SEC to raise $1 billion in new
   funding: On the heels of its chatbot Grok, the startup wants new money to
   "understand the true nature of the universe." (CNBC
   <https://venturebeat.us17.list-manage.com/track/click?u=f67554569818c29c4c844d121&id=1f4b3c5148&e=ac54f1564a>
   )

Thanks for reading, and continue to follow VB's leading coverage on all
things AI, big data and analytics!

Taryn Plumb

Innovator Spotlight


Note from the editor: 

Welcome to VentureBeat's Innovator Spotlight, where we bring you news on the most cutting edge technologies today. 

VB digest from this week: 

Asato: An AI copilot for CIOs
AI meets materials science
New reinforcement learning tool uses human cues to correct mistakes

And more — keep scrolling!

Other news we're following: 
  • Nvidia improves performance with 5X faster AI: With its rival AMD making a big announcement this week on its MI300 flagship GPU for generative AI, Nvidia remains confident that its hardware, software and integrated systems will keep it in the lead. To prove the point, Nvidia announced new benchmarks. Again. (Forbes)
  • Elon Musk's X.AI files with the SEC to raise $1 billion in new funding: On the heels of its chatbot Grok, the startup wants new money to "understand the true nature of the universe." (CNBC)
Thanks for reading, and continue to follow VB's leading coverage on all things AI, big data and analytics!

Taryn Plumb (taryn_plumb)

A year ago, it was just ChatGPT — now LLMs are everywhere

Since ChatGPT's launch a year ago, several chatbots have cropped up in a bid to democratize access to conversational AI capabilities.

Read more

New, open-source AI vision model emerges to take on ChatGPT — but it has issues

The new Nous model comes with SigLIP-400M integration and has been trained on a custom dataset enriched with feature calling.

Read more

IBM advances Quantum Computing ambitions with generative AI power for software development

IBM announced that its Quantum System Two architecture, which is powered by three IBM Quantum Heron processors has begun operations.

Read more

Meta AI unveils ‘Seamless’ translator for real-time communication across languages

Meta AI researchers have developed a new artificial intelligence model called 'Seamless' that enables more natural, real-time translation across languages while preserving vocal style and emotion.

Read more
